object.name: setStickerKeywords
object.description: Use this method to change search keywords assigned to a regular or custom emoji sticker. The sticker must belong to a sticker set created by the bot. Returns True on success.
object.html_description: Use this method to change search keywords assigned to a regular or custom emoji sticker. The sticker must belong to a sticker set created by the bot. Returns True on success.
object.rst_description: Use this method to change search keywords assigned to a regular or custom emoji sticker. The sticker must belong to a sticker set created by the bot. Returns :code:`True` on success.

annotations.description: A JSON-serialized list of 0-20 search keywords for the sticker with total length of up to 64 characters
annotations.html_description: A JSON-serialized list of 0-20 search keywords for the sticker with total length of up to 64 characters
annotations.rst_description: A JSON-serialized list of 0-20 search keywords for the sticker with total length of up to 64 characters
annotations.name: keywords
